original: “Sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamānasassa anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamānassa
analyzed: ▁sekh assa ▁bhikkhave ▁bhikkhuno ▁ appatt amān as assa ▁anuttar aṃ ▁yog a kkhe maṃ ▁patthay amān assa

original: viharato ajjhattikaṁ aṅganti karitvā nāññaṁ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ bahūpakāraṁ
analyzed: ▁viharat o ▁ajjhattik aṃ ▁aṃg anti ▁karitvā ▁nā ññaṃ ▁ekaṃ gam pi ▁samanupass āmi ▁yaṃ ▁evaṃ ▁bahū pa kār aṃ

original: Yoniso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasi karonto akusalaṁ pajahati, kusalaṁ bhāvetī”ti.
Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
